Others: The Mavericks lost to the Golden State Warriors with a final score of 120-117.
Steph Curry scored 37 points, nine assists, and six rebounds for the Warriors.
Luka Dončić scored 31 points for the Mavericks, but shot 2-for-10 from three-point land.
The Mavericks missed five of their last six shots and had one possession end in a turnover in the final minute.
Quentin Grimes had six points, six rebounds, and no turnovers in 29 minutes for the Mavericks.
The Warriors have found a defensive-minded starting unit featuring Trayce Jackson-Davis, De’Anthony Melton, Draymond Green, Andrew Wiggins, and Curry.
Buddy Hield comes off the bench for the Warriors and could be a contender for the sixth man of the year award.
